description.ko: 강철의 거인이 더 이상 보이지 않는 하늘을 향해 손을 뻗으며, 디지털 시대의 합성 광채에 젖어듭니다.
description.en: A steel giant reaches for a sky it can no longer see, bathed in the synthetic glow of a digital era.

prompt: A high-altitude perspective of a massive cyberpunk data-monolith tower piercing through a layer of thick, toxic neon-pink smog. Delivery drones leave long, glowing cyan light trails that cut through the volumetric fog. Textures of wet carbon fiber and rusted hyper-alloy surfaces are illuminated by massive holographic advertisements. Rendered in 8k, raytracing, featuring realistic light spill and global illumination. The atmosphere is heavy with futuristic urban texture, focusing on the contrast between the cold metal architecture and the vibrant digital romance of the city lights.
